mapper.select: select no, id, name, rank, title, hit, date, time, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS rownum from board, (select @rownum:=0) temp

select no, id, name, rank, title, hit, date, time, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS rownum from board, (select @rownum:=0) temp where
(id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
(name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
(rank like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
(title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
(id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR rank like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
mapper.insert: insert into comment (no, writer, date, content) values (#{no}, 1, NOW(), #{content})
